Why do so many people say SEED when theres over a thousand seeders?

You know why the speed is so slow? Its a new torrent and theres SOOO many people downloading, the 1000 seeders cant upload so fast to 10,000 leechers. 

Think about it, the ratio is 1/10, you're in competition with 10 other people to download off 1 person, and torrents upload on a first come first serve basis, so pretty much YOU have to wait for "10" people to fully download before you can start downloading off 1 seeder.

This ISO WORKS 100%

Load and burn to a cd .

Install the game but do not START the GAME yet.

After you have installed the game close down the game and find the NEW Wolfenstein 1.1 Patch....install the patch...

now find the Crack and install...
for windows XP 
Start / My computer / local Disk (C:) / Program Files / Activision / Wolfenstein / SP

the SP is the file where you install the Crack

just right click on the patch and COPY and then Paste in the SP file folder

close everything down and restart your computer and now you can play the game ...enjoy

How to install the game.

Load the ISO with DaemonTools. (free).
Install the game. (DO NOT PLAY).
Install the patch.
Copy and paste the crack into the C/Program Files/Activision/Wolfenstein/SP folder.
Reboot.
Play!

For all of you that get 'Sync out of range' message on your monitor, here is how you fix it:

right click on the game shortcut icon, click properties, and in the target field after the 'exe' extension leave one space empty and add the following line:

+set r_displayRefresh 60 +set r_customwidth 1024 +set r_customheight 768

Of course, you can change the refresh rate and the resolution to what you normally use when playing games.

What happens is that either immediately or after about 10 minutes, it will start to flash part of a previous screen in the left corner and occasionally there is no sound. It also seems to disable firing on my mp though all other weapons work. Finally, it tends to crash, like my whole pc, vertical purple 'alien' scipt seems to stream down the screen. I ran into this once before with NFSMW Black, but a good reset to dump the ram seemed to work, though not this time. 
I am running 3ghz CPU HT, NVidia GEForce 8500 GT with 1/2 gig ded ram, 2gig mb ram. I am running the game at mid-high settings with no lag and this machine can handle Crysis on low-mid, so I'm pretty sure it's not my hardware.
Any ideas?

Alright, the guy above me, annoying, really? Spamming on a forum? You suck, lol. Second, for those who bothered to read my previous comment about the game freezing and all that, I figured out the problem, of course I ended up reinstalling and all of that, but it was a simple fix. I change an option menu one at a time until it broke again and discovered something quite noobish on my part. I run 5.1 ssound. The game defaults to 7.1 when you select ssound. Translation=it breaks the game when you run 7.1 through 5.1 hardware. You can select the version of dolby you want, so, problem fixed, enjoy the game, it rocks balls.

Great torrent. Fun game and downloaded fast (I'm not one to usually complain about seeding). 

In the great tradition of torrenting games, i will break down this shit as simply as possible.

1. Once Downloaded, find where utorrent put the files and runs setup. 

2. Install the game with default settings.

3. Go to the Razor1911 folder and right click on the Wolfenstein.exe and clik copy.

4. Go to your program files, find the Activision folder, then go to wolfenstein, then go to the SP folder, then paste the file in here. Click copy and replace when asked.

Now your done. Just click on the wolfenstein.exe you pasted in this folder and wolfenstein should run. Also, you can play this game online a cracked server but I'm not telling how to do that. Just look it up.
